text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA What a fu@k ^*g coward you are. Can’t even directly speak the truth about COVID-19 which is ravaging our country. I think u need to reacquaint yourself w/ the oath u took or forfeit ur license. Trump sucking COWARD! Is Steve.
